hardcore.explanation: Excludes the player loot table from randomization.

no-cheats.explanation: Excludes loot tables in "requires_cheats.json" from randomization.
no-cheats.hover:
Excludes tables only accessible through cheets:
- Giant
- Illusioner

no-dead-ends.explanation: Fills empty loot tables with randomly chosen tables.

hide-seed.explanation: Excludes your provided seed from the datapack name.

co-op.explanation: Grants all players randomization notes when as they are unlocked.
